import numpy as np def ndvi(in_ar, out_ar, xoff, yoff, xsize, ysize, raster_xsize, raster_ysize, buf_radius, gt, **kwargs): nir = in_ar[0].astype('float32', copy=False) red = in_ar[1].astype('float32', copy=False)
# clamp to sensible SR range nir = np.where(np.isfinite(nir), np.clip(nir, 0, 1.0), np.nan) red = np.where(np.isfinite(red), np.clip(red, 0, 1.0), np.nan)
num = nir - red den = nir + red
eps = 1e-6 # Guard against miniscule values ~0 out = np.full_like(nir, np.nan, dtype='float32') good = np.isfinite(num) & np.isfinite(den) & (np.abs(den) > eps) out[good] = num[good] / den[good] out_ar[:] = out
